abiDocs.name: transferFrom
abiDocs.notice: Transfer tokens on behalf of another user

inputs.name: _rate
inputs.description: Number of wei to be refunded per token

inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: Tokens to create for this user (in base value)

abiDocs.name: transferAdmin
abiDocs.notice: Relinquish admin rights to another address

inputs.name: _blockNumber
inputs.description: Contract will become active if current block is greater or equal than this

abiDocs.name: redeem
abiDocs.notice: ⚠️ Burn entire token balance in exchange for wei

inputs.name: _owner
inputs.description: Address of a holder that has redeemed

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: The address of the recipient of the tokens

inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: The numver of tokens (in base value, 1e9 = 1dgd)

abiDocs.name: transfer
abiDocs.notice: Transfer sender's tokens to another account

abiDocs.name: fund
abiDocs.details: is the only `payable` method, to prevent accidental sends to default

abiDocs.name: drain
abiDocs.notice: Send all of contract's ETH balance to an address
